title: Unconscious bias workshop
desc:
Building on the unconscious bias e-learning, this workshop increases awareness of your own behaviours. It encourages you to reflect if you need to make changes to your decision-making and thought processes to ensure you are inclusive and fair.

This course is suitable for everyone and is of particular value if you're a line manager. There is also an unconscious bias workshop for SCS.

outcomes.blurb:
This workshop challenges the culture and environment of the civil service and offers opportunities to practise techniques to overcome unconscious bias.

On completing this course, you’ll be able to:
points: identify instances of unconscious bias in the workplace and understand why they occur and the impact they can have
apply newly learnt techniques to identify, challenge, prevent and remove issues of unconscious bias in the work place.
recognise examples of unconscious bias in your own behaviour and use the techniques to check any personal instances at work
ensure you are inclusive and fair in complying with employment processes, such as performance managment and reward and recognition
